Table of Contents

Programming Guide - Tutorial on how to write and compile programs using ME*000

Reference Manual - Autodocs generated by Doxygen from header files

White Papers - general topics including loudness optimization, etc.

Example Programs - for learning how to program ME*000

Quality Assurance - for testing and validating ME*000

Release Notes - not included with Evaluation Kit

Contents of Complete Release

Note: the evaluation kit does not contain all of these files.
Path
Contents
ringtones Polyphonic ringtones
midi miscellaneous MIDI files for testing
midi/qa MIDI files for testing specific features of the software
spmidi source code and documentation repository
spmidi/benchmarks tool for measuring performance
spmidi/docs documentation home
spmidi/docs/autodocs autodoc reference generated by doxygen
spmidi/engine synthesis engine and MIDI handler
spmidi/examples examples of how to call ME*000
spmidi/export folder containing instrument definitions and wavetables used to build ME2000
spmidi/export/waves instrument wavetables in 'C' source format for ME2000
spmidi/include 'C' headers for Mobileer API
spmidi/jukebox Jukebox support for high level interactive music
spmidi/orchestras XML files containing instrument definitions, used by Java based instrument editor
spmidi/qa Quality Assurance suite
spmidi/qa/data various SMF, DLS and MXMF files used by the QA programs
spmidi/util various utilities used by tests and examples
